name: The Lost Treasure (Ak47shays)
description:
The lost treasure is a text based adventure game where you play as Jerry who sets on a journey to find his family long missing treasure. 

The game is still in its very early development with missing assets and chapters. 

Only a demo of the prologue is available for now. This was released for the "I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story" game jam hosted by charlmes.

Comments and feedbacks are welcome.

NOTE: Game is made for android devices. A windows version is available for the game jam. 

Thank you.
